name: MANHA FOUNDATION
briefDescription: To provide educational - medical assistance, organize health awareness  programmes, celebrate   festivals and  special  days with  orphans, destitute and  differently - abled  children,  render  timely help and  relief  during disaster / crisis,  and mobilize  like-minded people to build a socially conscious, selfless society. Our vision is to create awareness and build a socially conscious, selfless society, helping people in distress, poverty and during crisis.
